tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** **** ****** *** *** **** ** *** ****** * We travel 50 Kms one way to visit her but it's totally worth it. She knows what she does and is clear with her treatment instructions and course she advises. Can follow her words blindly. 
P.S : For those writing that she is rude, you need to understand the difference between rude and professional.

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Medical Termination Of Pregnancy (Mtp),
review: Dr.alka sinha is very experienced *** **** *********,patient have to good response to care.and good explanation for any issue and treatment are also satisfaction for patients.and friendly doctor and firstly my sister got check up and actually she was late for traffic and doctor appointment time is 6.30 pm  and Dr Alka  Sinha waiting to my sister for check up and calm down  and my sister are also satisfied to her doctor for prescribed my sister.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had a bad experience, doctor was very shrewd, did not even listen to my problems and the way she talked I felt as if she doesn't even bother what I'm.going through. Least expected of any doctor esp in pregnancy. I do not recommend going to her. Pregnancy is a beautiful phase which should not be wasted going to such impolite  & arrogant doctors.

Not a good doctor. Does not understand patient. Does not help in case of medical urgency. Insults the patient. Does not suggest using her services to other would be mothers. It a special time being pregnant,  not sugguested to waste on such rude and unhelpful doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: my wife visited Dr alka sinha for pregnancy , and i must say she is a very experienced and a reliable doctor when it comes to handling ur child and wife for pregnancy .... ahe has handled quite a lot od complex cases like that of my wife . my wife case was handled very well , and i am now a father of a very beautiful daughter and my wife is perfectly fine .... Dr alka sinha has done her studies from American college from gynecologists , and follows their guidelines .. my wife went through normal delivery , when it was looking as if she would go through c section but the doctor handled the case quite well .... she answered all her queries quite well .... and my wife and me all are quite happy that our baby and beloved wife were in the hands of a capable doctor like her ...

context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant,Pregnant Women Counseling,
review: Alka Sinha is not a reliable doctor. She sits in BLK Hospital & Westside clinic.She will take consultation fees from you for 9 months & sadly then will not come at the time of delivery. Women feel so insure at the time of delivery in the hands of another doctor whom she had not met before. She along with her another Jr Dr.  (Taranum Shakeel) will scare you with various technical terms at the time of delievr* * **** *** *** ******** ********* ** ***** *** *** **** **** **** *** *** *** ****** ** ****** ** **** Pregnancy is a very sensitive period in women's life. ******* **** **** **** *** ********** **** *** *** ** *** ********* She is not approachable on phone. Give excuses for everything. I'll strictly not recommend her. The only reason for writing the review is to aware online, atech friendly soon to be mothers, to be aware of Dr. Alka Sinha.
She is a very experienced and professional doctor. Staff was friendly. BLK Max hospital is in itself is renowned.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Dr. Alka is very experienced and truthful. Does not take any chances while recommending any test or medicine. Has done NVD where we thought of c section. Her team in BLK is also very wonderful.
********* ********* ** **** ** ********** She speaks less , but to the point. It is worth to get treated by her.
Have to wait for more than an hour to meet dr. As you people promise that the dr would be available with in 60 minutes was not kept.
